thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com | 24 of 3545
thread.title: Jeffrey

author: Jeffrey
title: Jeffrey
text:
Found a bunch of books for reasonable prices, shipping was free. The books that arrived were of reasonable quality as described from the website.
One package arrived just fine, one arrived with the corner of a book sticking out of the bag. That corner was damaged and showed some water damage as well.
Shipping information was not updated very well until about 3 or 4 days after shipping. The shopping and purchasing experience was fine, but I was disappointed at how the books were packaged and shipped.
